description: This file defines a Room Database class for persisting Note objects offline in an Android application. It specifies the database configuration and provides an abstract method to access the NoteDao.

classes.name: NoteDatabase
classes.description: An abstract class extending RoomDatabase, serving as the main database holder for Note entities, with method to access NoteDao.

methods.name: noteDao
methods.description: Abstract method to retrieve the DAO for Note entities.
